subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: I was raised a connoisseur of terrible, horrible, very bad pro teams: Mets-Jets-Knicks. But the 2014-15 Knicks are in hot pursuit of historic bad.
snippet: I was raised a connoisseur of terrible, horrible, very bad pro teams: Mets-Jets-Knicks. But the 2014-15 Knicks are in hot pursuit of historic bad.
